name: Botanic Power Crisis
description:
Botanic Power Crisis

Zepp is the keeper of the power plant. He wants to start his workday, but for some reason a horde of mutated flowers has taken over. 

Use multiple gadgets to destroy them and free the power station from this botanical nightmare.

Fight through 22 levels and collect upgrades for your weapons.

Created for GBJAM 10.

Controls KeyboardFunctionWASD / Arrow KeysMove ZeppJDash

Used color palette: LINKS AWAKENING (SGB)
